list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gambling game in which a ball is dropped onto a revolving wheel ( roulette wheel ) with numbered compartments, the players betting on the number at which the ball will come to rest.
a tool or machine with a revolving toothed wheel, used in engraving or for making slit-shaped perforations between postage stamps.
make slit-shaped perforations in (paper, especially sheets of postage stamps).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pages are rouletted next to the binding
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các trang được kết nối bên cạnh sự ràng buộc
